channel.title: Building Whonix from frozen sources, snapshot.debian.org, security discussion
channel.description:
[html]

Beginning from Whonix 7.4.0 (not released yet), Whonix’s build script has been adapted to build from snapshot.debian.org instead of from the more popular ftp.us.debian.org. This has pros and cons, which are discussed here:

https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Dev/BuildDocumentation_8#CurrentSources_Builds_.28Optional.29

[/html]
